item.title: Walk Off the Earth
item.author: Theo Pavlakou,
item.description: We’ve all heard Walk Off the Earth’s cover of ‘_Somebody That I Used to Know_’ by Gotye, and if you haven’t then you should get on it, because these guys are actually good. Actually, they’re better than good. They’re talented. And they use their talent creatively. A lot of stuff goes on YouTube that …

item.title: Do they owe us a living?
item.author: Theo Pavlakou,
item.description: People, including me, seem to nag about how bands are continuously following the crowd and moving more towards the mainstream genres, instead of keeping it underground and just making music like they used to – a term known as “selling out”. But in our increasingly greedy, torrent-driven society, …
